sentence: All in all I was pleased that this property offered practical and useful amenities rather than trying to present an idea of luxury without delivering anything of substance

The city view the kitchen the gym the hospitality and service of the staff front desk was very friendlyThe choices for breakfast and the length of time it took for room service neglected to bring something to the room at one point
Nice little uncrowded gym
nice breakfastwe almost missed our train because of the elevator
The generous breakfasts and tapas hours and use of computer facilities added to the enjoyment of our stay
Full kitchen facility as well so if you wanted to make your trip self catered then you could
The area is nice several places to eat within a block of the hotel entrance and quick access to the metro to get you where ever you need to be
Great place to stay to rest your bones if you love breakfast outside and use seldomly the elevators
The staff were amazing especially Bryan and Roosevelt in the lobby would stay again

As a frequent traveler I try to always stay in Starwod properties as they are known for their facilities and high levels of customer service of which I have experienced in the many years of being a loyal Starwod customer
just be patient with elevators because sometimes you have to wait more than ten minutes
If you do nt want to spend your vacation waiting on an elevator done stay here
The size of our room the hotels location and the open bar every afternoon during wekdaysto crowded in using the elevators
Long lines and waits to check in and for the elevator
Sometimes waiting for the elevator was a pain there was a car convention on at the time and ALL the employees were staying at element so it was quite busy
Area dirty and crowded always elevator repairman there
Elevator bottom does not work in 23th floor
Too crowded for Lunch almost imposibleThe elevators are a mess they have rush hours
Sometimes we had to eat in the lobby as there was no space
The complaints about the elevators are no joke but if you ’re prepared for it you can plan ahead
